nodes.text: Dragonelles were a type of creature that were one of the Chiss Irizi'ar'alani's favorite subjects to sculpt during her free time while she was a student at the Taharim Academy on the planet Naporar. Her fellow student Mitth'raw'nuruodo studied her sculptures and correctly determined from her favorite subjects—dragonelles, groundlions, and predator birds—that she would favor short attacks, hesitation feints, and aggression when fighting. Using this and other information gleaned from the sculptures, he was then able to defeat her in a sparring match.
Dragonelles were first mentioned in a flashback in the 2020 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising, which was written by Timothy Zahn.
